name: Speed Battle
description:
An endless battle, enemies coming from everywhere and you are alone. Choosing between protecting yourself with armor or staying light will make all the difference between life and death.

Move with W, A, S, D and attack with space.

All feedback is super welcome. Let me know what you think and what your maximum score is!

Made with Godot, Aseprite, Tilesetter and Rytmik Studio
